entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.7°C

Observed at: Elk Island National Park 12:00 PM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023
